message.content:
{"id": "124599", "title": "Bug 124599: Shortcut delete and menu delete behave differently in table column", "description": "Description: Shortcut delete and menu delete behave differently in table column.

Steps to reproduce:
1. [Please provide more detailed instructions on how to reproduce the issue.]

OB: [Please provide the expected behavior for the shortcut delete and menu delete in the table column.]

EB: Undo the deletion, then click delete in the context menu.

SR: The shortcut delete and menu delete should have the same behavior.

Actual result: In step 2, the whole grid in the group header was deleted. In step 3, the grid in the group header remained untouched."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
